verses.verse: וַיִּסְע֖וּ <WH5265> vai-yis-'U set forward בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> be-Nei And the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El; of Israel וַֽיַּחֲנוּ֙ <WH2583> vai-ya-cha-Nu and pitched בְּעַֽרְב֣וֹת <WH6160> be-'ar-Vot in the plains מוֹאָ֔ב <WH4124> mo-'Av, of Moab מֵעֵ֖בֶר <WH5676> me-'E-ver on this side לְיַרְדֵּ֥ן <WH3383> le-yar-Den Jordan יְרֵחֽוֹ׃ <WH3405> ye-re-Cho. [by] Jericho ס sa-Mek

וַיַּ֥רְא <WH7200> vai-Yar saw בָּלָ֖ק <WH1111> ba-Lak And Balak בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- the son צִפּ֑וֹר <WH6834> tzip-Por; of Zippor אֵ֛ת <WH853> 'et כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- all אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> 'a-Sher- after עָשָׂ֥ה <WH6213> 'a-Sah had done יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El all that Israel לָֽאֱמֹרִֽי׃ <WH567> La-'e-mo-Ri. to the Amorites

וַיָּ֨גָר <WH1481> vai-Ya-gor afraid מוֹאָ֜ב <WH4124> mo-'Av And Moab מִפְּנֵ֥י <WH6440> mip-pe-Nei of הָעָ֛ם <WH5971> ha-'Am the people מְאֹ֖ד <WH3966> me-'Od was sore כִּ֣י <WH3588> ki for רַב־ <WH7227> rav- because they [were] many ה֑וּא <WH1931> Hu; he וַיָּ֣קָץ <WH6973> vai-Ya-kotz was distressed מוֹאָ֔ב <WH4124> mo-'Av, and Moab מִפְּנֵ֖י <WH6440> mip-pe-Nei because of בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> be-Nei the children יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El. of Israel
